Sequence Information.Function: Has broad-spectrum antimicrobial properties. Has antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive bacterium L.monocytogenes EGD and the Gram-negative bacteria E.coli ML-35p and avirulent S.typhimurium 7953, but not against the mouse-virulent S.typhimurium 14028S. Probably contributes to the antimicrobial barrier function of the small bowel mucosa.

Literature.Title: Structure and diversity of the murine cryptdin gene family.
Literature.Author: Ouellette A.J.,Selsted M.E.,Huttner K.M.

Literature.Title: Mouse Paneth cell defensins: primary structures and antibacterial activities of numerous cryptdin isoforms.
Literature.Author: Huttner K.M.,Cano-Gauci D.F.,Nosek M.T.,Hsieh M.M.,Ouellette A.J.

Literature.Title: Cryptdins: antimicrobial defensins of the murine small intestine.
Literature.Author: Lehrer R.I.,Harwig S.S.S.L.,Eisenhauer P.B.
